original_text: I, John, am the one who heard and saw these things. And when I had heard and seen them, I fell down to worship at the feet of the angel who had been showing them to me.
korean_text: 이것들을 보고 들은 자는 나 요한이니 내가 듣고 볼 때에 이 일을 내게 보이던 천사의 발 앞에 경배하려고 엎드렸더니

sentences.original_text: am one who heard and saw these things.
And when I had heard and seen them,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 그것들을 듣고 보았을 때,

sentences.original_text: at the feet of the angel
who had been showing them to me.
